GUI

Class Sound

  • java.lang.Object
    • GUI.Sound

  • public class Sound
extends java.lang.Object
    Sound class contains all the music Clips which will be used in the program.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Dzmitry Murzich

      void announceGameWinner(java.lang.String winner)

      This method plays a clip at the end of each round announcing the winner.
      void playSound(javax.sound.sampled.Clip clip)
      This method plays a clip and pauses the program execution until clip has finished playing.

    • Method Detail

      • playSound

        public void playSound(javax.sound.sampled.Clip clip)
        This method plays a clip and pauses the program execution until clip has finished playing.
        Parameters:
        clip - Clip object that will be played.

      • announceRoundWinner

        public void announceRoundWinner(java.lang.String winner)
        This method plays a clip at the end of each round announcing the winner.
        Parameters:
        winner - String which contains the winner of the round.

      • announceGameWinner

        public void announceGameWinner(java.lang.String winner)
        This method plays a clip at the end of each match announcing the winner.
        Parameters:
        winner - String which contains the winner of the match.
